topics.body:
Alright! My 3DS finally shipped. Right now it's in North Carolina, but it should be arriving here by Thursday.

Also, something else came in the mail for me: A copy of Unfinished Tales of Numenor and Middle-Earth. I ordered it forever ago, but I completely forgot about it until it arrived in my mailbox.
